 2024-10672024-09-27ISED
ActBoards of Trade Act
SubjectOrder Approving the Boundary Change of the Chambre de commerce et d'Industrie Vallée-du-Richelieu
PrecisOrder approving the application by the CHAMBRE DE COMMERCE ET D'INDUSTRIE VALLÉE-DU-RICHELIEU, in Quebec, to CHANGE THE BOUNDARIES of its district from from Beloeil, McMasterville, Mont-Saint-Hilaire, Otterburn Park, Saint-Antoine-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Charles-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Denis-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Jean-Baptiste, Saint-Marc-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Mathieu-de-Beloeil, Sainte-Madeleine, Sainte-Marie-Madeleine, Chambly, Carignan, Saint-Mathias-sur-Richelieu and Richelieu to Saint-Antoine-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Marc-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Denis-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Charles-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Mathieu-de-Beloeil, Beloeil, Mont-Saint-Hilaire, Sainte-Madeleine, Sainte-Marie-Madeleine, McMasterville, Otterburn Park, Saint-Jean-Baptiste, Saint-Mathias-sur-Richelieu, Carignan, Chambly, Richelieu, Marieville, Rougemont, Saint-Césaire, Saint-Angèle-de-Monnoir, Saint-Paul-D’Abbotsford and Ange-Gardien.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the application by the CHAMBRE DE COMMERCE ET D'INDUSTRIE VALLÉE-DU-RICHELIEU, in Quebec, to CHANGE THE BOUNDARIES of its district from from Beloeil, McMasterville, Mont-Saint-Hilaire, Otterburn Park, Saint-Antoine-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Charles-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Denis-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Jean-Baptiste, Saint-Marc-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Mathieu-de-Beloeil, Sainte-Madeleine, Sainte-Marie-Madeleine, Chambly, Carignan, Saint-Mathias-sur-Richelieu and Richelieu to Saint-Antoine-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Marc-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Denis-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Charles-sur-Richelieu, Saint-Mathieu-de-Beloeil, Beloeil, Mont-Saint-Hilaire, Sainte-Madeleine, Sainte-Marie-Madeleine, McMasterville, Otterburn Park, Saint-Jean-Baptiste, Saint-Mathias-sur-Richelieu, Carignan, Chambly, Richelieu, Marieville, Rougemont, Saint-Césaire, Saint-Angèle-de-Monnoir, Saint-Paul-D’Abbotsford and Ange-Gardien.
